title: Patch 7.12
body: Hello, everyone. So I recently just finished updating league of legends patch 7.12, and everything ran smoothly. But when I opened league again, it had a yellow exclamation mark saying log in issues. My client is in 7.12 but the events and skins are not here and I still have the caitlyn and trynd skins as the latest. Please help on how I can get to the new update, I really want to buy the nightbringer skin and try the events

replies.body: You can verify that you're on the current patch (7.12) on the bottom right of the client.  Content like new skins are aimed to be released this patch per the notes, but it doesn't mean it will be on the same day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any updates on upcoming goodies!
